description: 5 Windows Registry tools for advanced users, including RegScanner to search keys and values in the Registry, RegFromApp to monitor Registry changes made by application and generate a .reg file for these changes, RegDllView for viewing the details of all dll/ocx registered on your system, ActiveXHelper for viewing the list of all ActiveX components installed on your computer, and RegFileExport, a command-line tool that export data from offline Registry file into a standard .reg file of Windows.
